title: New: Laurel – To The Hills
content:
Teenage singer/songwriter Laurel gets better with every track she releases.

So the Lana Del Rey comparisons are likely to run hard and fast, yet new track To The Hills has more of a kick to it, whilst retaining the wistful, bubblegum pop elements that made her early demos so attractive. Part of an EP out 7 April on her own imprint Next Time Records, it’s a mightily promising step forward.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
